summary: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter it.
cast: Stephen Boyd|Raquel Welch|Edmond O'Brien|Donald Pleasence|Arthur O'Connell|William Redfield|Arthur Kennedy|Jean Del Val|Barry Coe|Ken Scott|Shelby Grant|James Brolin|Brendan Fitzgerald|Brendon Boone|Kenneth MacDonald|Christopher Riordan
title: Viaje alucinante
